org.globus.opensaml11.md.metadata
Interface Metadata

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLMetadata, XMLMetadataLoadWrapper, XMLMetadataProvider
public interface Metadata

Ported from Scott Cantor's C++ interfaces

Author:
Walter Hoehn (wassa@columbia.edu)

Method Summary
 EntitiesDescriptor getRootEntities()
          Get access to the root entity group in the metadata instance, or null if the root is a single entity.
 EntityDescriptor getRootEntity()
          Get access to the root entity in the metadata instance, or null if the root is a group.
 EntityDescriptor lookup(Artifact artifact)
          Find an entity descriptor that issued a SAML artifact.
 EntityDescriptor lookup(Artifact artifact, boolean strict)
          Find an entity descriptor that issued a SAML artifact.
 EntityDescriptor lookup(String id)
          Find an entity descriptor by its unique identifier.
 EntityDescriptor lookup(String id, boolean strict)
          Find an entity descriptor by its unique identifier.
 

Method Detail

lookup

EntityDescriptor lookup(String id,
                        boolean strict)
Find an entity descriptor by its unique identifier.

Parameters:
id - The unique identifier of the site of interest
strict - Honor metadata validity information?
Returns:
The corresponding entity

lookup

EntityDescriptor lookup(Artifact artifact,
                        boolean strict)
Find an entity descriptor that issued a SAML artifact.

Parameters:
artifact - The artifact whose source site is of interest
strict - Honor metadata validity information?
Returns:
The issuing entity

lookup

Find an entity descriptor by its unique identifier.

Parameters:
id - The unique identifier of the site of interest
Returns:
The corresponding entity

lookup

EntityDescriptor lookup(Artifact artifact)
Find an entity descriptor that issued a SAML artifact.

Parameters:

Returns:

getRootEntity

EntityDescriptor getRootEntity()
Get access to the root entity in the metadata instance, or null if the root is a group.

Returns:
The root entity, if any

getRootEntities

EntitiesDescriptor getRootEntities()
Get access to the root entity group in the metadata instance, or null if the root is a single entity.

Returns:
The root group, if any
